name: Shatter (itch) (K1NGSLAYER, nuochen)
description:
PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE YOU START THE GAME

Scroll up with mouse to flick the coin

Scroll down with mouse to drop the coin

Shoot the coin with LMB

Grapple the coin fragment with RMB

Fill in the teleport meter by shooting at enemy AI and aim at coin/fragment and press T to teleport

Alt + F4 to quit the game

Knock the enemy AI out of the map by shooting at the coin near it

Feel free to spend a couple of minutes filling in this survey: https://forms.gle/qz5ok3Bh7C3wmhT68
